definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: judge; pl. [[פְּלִילִים]] De 32:31 our enemies being judges, umpires; ´[[עָוֹן פ]] Job 31:11, rd. ´[[עֲוֹן פ]] acc. to Di Siegf, cf. De; < [[עָוֹן פְּלִילִי]] as v:Job 31:28, so Bu Du; [[בִּפְלִלִים]] Ex 21:22, rd. perh. [[בַּנְּפָלִים]] for the abortion Bu:ZAW xi (1891), 107, cf. also Di-Ry.
